name: Sheraton Milan Malpensa Airport Hotel & Conference Centre

reviews.title: sheraton mxp
reviews.text: miss selena,checked me in very easy and got a room far from the elevator and with view of the rooms across and the terminal 1.the room was clean,not very big,but decent size and a medium bathroom with a slippery bathtub.the breakfast was very good and the staff was very nice and delivered a good service.

reviews.title: Best Airport Hotel in my experience!
reviews.text: the minuses were that i couldn't use the minifridge filled with all the things you wouldn't eat or drink ,the hotel was half an hour away by train from milano downtown,the internet was not free and quiet expensive .this is a place where you stay only between flights,but not more than 2nights

reviews.title: Don't pay for delux mountain view
reviews.text: Excellent way to work through layovers or if you have to fly in and out because of legs. Rooms large by EU standards and very quiet (no jet noise). Hotel decor is a very well done redo of a 70's hotel, complete with retro furniture: very nice and sleek.

reviews.title: Made a tough trip much better!
reviews.text: Restuarant and bars are excellent. Spa (pool, hyrdo therapy, massage) is super-and I took advantange of a massage post work out (and post flight) after arriving. Hair salon on the same floor (I also used this having run out of time at home to get a hair cut). Both excellent.

reviews.title: Very convenient but at a high cost
reviews.text: To get to the hotel (located outside of Terminal 1) follow signs outside of customs in Terminal 1 to Sheraton- be aware that one must either take the escalator to level (-1) or the elevator to level (-1) and cross UNDER the roadway. The signs are visible but it is Not easy to figure out that one must go under the roadway to get to the hotel.

reviews.title: An excellent airport hotel
reviews.text: Stayed for 1 night to catch a flight early next morning. Price wise the hotel was excellent. Breakfast was very good more like a 5 start standard. Most of all service was excellent. All in all a 5 out of 5 choice.

reviews.title: Smart choice!
reviews.text: We stayed at the Sheraton which is connected to the Malpensa Airport in Milan. It was a great choice. The room was clean and the location perfect to connect our early morning flight. The people at the desk were very accomodating. It had a nice bar area where we had a few appetizers that were provided free and the bartender was very nice. Would definitely stay there again if in Milan!

reviews.title: As close as it can get to the airport
reviews.text: Just outside of the terminal , you can actually take your walk with your luggage straight in from the terminal just outside the arrival area . You dont get to see the property since it appears as a reception within the airport itself .

reviews.title: A wonderful stay, we wish we could stay more
reviews.text: Best in case you have an early morning flight , the hotel also provides room for day use at very nominal cost

reviews.title: New hotel hotel still trying to find its feet.
reviews.text: We were in Milan for two days due to business and we truly enjoyed our stay to Sheraton Malpensa Hotel. The room was great, very nice modern decorated, the bed was incredibly comfortable. The bathroom was also a very pleasant surprice as it was as big as the bedroom, also with very nice details. In general the elegant atmosphere and all the materials of high standards in the room made us feel very cosy and welcome.

reviews.title: convenient but cold and impersonal
reviews.text: After driving for 3 hours on an italian motorway trying to avoid the onslaught of the super heavy trucks on one side and speed crazy drivers on the other, and finally getting alive to the airport, all you want is a decent room and a comfortable bed to sleep it off.

reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!!!
reviews.text: The hotel, which is inside the airport (no need for a shuttle, just walk in) provides that.

reviews.title: Two steps from terminal
reviews.text: It is modern, clean and comfortable and everything works.

reviews.title: OK as airport hotels go
reviews.text: If on the other hand you like some warmth and a friendly tratoria on the corner, don’t stay here.

reviews.title: Very convenient for late/early flights
reviews.text: This is an impersonal “sleeping machine” for people who are coming or going from this airport at ungodly hours.

reviews.title: Perfect for stay at Malpensa
reviews.text: Beautiful facility with excellent staff. Rooms are large and very comfortable. Easy access to Terminal 1.

reviews.title: The nearest to the airport with great breakfast.
reviews.text: I stayed at the hotel for a couple of nights. It's located just outside the airport. The room wasn't properly cleaned, but after I complained about it, I was upgraded. The breakfast was very good, and so were the other amenities.

reviews.title: Make sure you ring and confirm your Booking and ask if any large tours are booking in the same day
reviews.text: We were treated terribly by this chain which we will never use again internationally. They claim to have piping problems and a large tour group booking in the same day as us and of course the power of the big bucks caused us, not parties from the tour group, to be shifted to another hotel which the Sheraton claims to be equal or greater in standard to theirs. Fat chance. I asked the date of confirmation of the booking of the large tour group and non one claimed to know!!!!!!! Hard to believe.

reviews.title: The Great Return
reviews.text: Sofitel for me all the way. Sheraton should downgrade their claims of customer service.

reviews.title: Convenient location for transfering flights.
reviews.text: I have previously reviewed the Sheraton at Milan Malpensa when I traveled to Italy in November 2010 and it was not a very pleasant experience. I hesitated about staying there again on our last night in Europe but with a 10AM departure time, I figured I could just suck it and deal with it.

aka: Sheraton Milan Malpensa Airport Hotel And Conference Centre
description: This is not just a hotel at the airport: it is right inside Terminal 1, moments away from the gates. Perfectly soundproofed rooms shut out all the noise and leave you with a stunning view of Monte Rosa. Enjoy moments of pure wellness in the SPA and its indoor pool.
